content: The treasury management system for #Endgame is designed to ensure the long-term stability and growth of the token. This is achieved by engaging in calculated sells and buys to maintain a steady growth rate. This includes re-balancing validator investments to generate consistent buybacks and buying back tokens for appreciation or burning to maintain a sustainable growth rate for the long term. This approach can help to ensure that the token remains valuable and attractive to investors over time, which can help to support the growth of the community and the token.
